definition[0]: if a gas condenses, or is condensed, it becomes a liquid
example[0]: the mist which condensed on every cold surface
example[1]: The gaseous metal is cooled and condenses into liquid zinc.
definition[1]: to make something that is spoken or written shorter, by not giving as much detail or using fewer words to give the same information
example[2]: This whole chapter could be condensed into a few paragraphs.
definition[2]: to make a liquid thicker by removing some of the water
